Vanish Oxi Action sprej odstraňovač skvrn má okamžitý účinek proti skvrnám hned napoprvé. Jeho účinné složení proniká hluboko do vláken a rozpouští dokonce i ty nejodolnější skvrny, jako je špína a mastnota na límcích a manžetách. Je vhodný na barevné i bílé oblečení a prádlo. Bezpečné na barevné i bílé materiály, při dodržení doporučení výrobců materiálů. Před použitím otestujte stálobarevnost na skrytém místě materiálu. Opláchněte a nechte oschnout. items.desc: Tea Basilur Carnival Winter Festival 75 g:Can you enjoy a cup of tea and enjoy it in the comfort of your own home? Then you will certainly be interested in Basilur tea. The first mention of black tea comes from China to…
items.raw_desc: Tea Basilur Carnival Winter Festival 75 g:Can you enjoy a cup of tea and enjoy it in the comfort of your own home? Then you will certainly be interested in Basilur tea. The first mention of black tea comes from China towards the end of the 16th century. It all starts with the harvesting of the leaves of the Chinese or Assamese tea tree. The next step is the so-called. wilting, which is the process by which water evaporates from the petals. The leaves are then rolled. The final stage is the oxidation process, which gives the tea its final flavour, aroma and colour. Oxidation is stopped by rapid heating, e.g. pan frying, steaming or baking. You can buy Basilur tea in a 75 g pack. Essential advantages of Basilur Carnival Winter Festival tea 75 g tin Have a more pleasant day with a cup of delicious tea You will love black tea for its specific earthy taste Packing with a total weight of 75 g

items.raw_desc: Pulzoximéter Contec CMS50D:        The Contec CMS50D oximeter is suitable for use at home, on the road and in medical facilities. It is intended for non-invasive measurement of hemoglobin oxygen saturation, in the arethral part of the bloodstream, and heart rate. It is a suitable tool for asthmatics, people with heart disease, but also athletes and those who move at great heights. To measure, it uses two light rays with different wavelengths, which fall on a finger inserted into the device. It measures the saturation of the blood with oxygen in the range of 0-100% and the heart rate in the range of 30-235 beats per minute.
